actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a recorded vote upon the passage of any legislation that economically affects Members as a separate class, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Rule VIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a recorded vote on legislation that would economically affect Members of Congress as a separate and distinct class. Makes it out of order in the House to consider such legislation unless it is comprised solely of items that economically affect Congressmen.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a recorded vote upon the passage of any legislation that economically affects Members as a separate class, and for other purposes.
